deepforest package¶

Submodules¶

deepforest.cli module¶

Console script for deepforest.

deepforest.cli.main()[source]¶

Console script for deepforest.

deepforest.deepforest module¶

class deepforest.deepforest.deepforest(weights=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for training and predicting tree crowns in RGB images

Args:

weights (str): Path to model weights on disk. Default is None

Attributes:

model: A keras training model from keras-retinanet

Methods

predict_image(self, image_path)

Predict tree crowns based on loaded (or trained) model

train(self, image_dir, label_csv)

Train a deep learning tree detection model This is the main entry point for training a new model based on either existing weights or scratch

use_release(self)

Use the latest DeepForest model release from github and load model.
predict_image(self, image_path)[source]¶

Predict tree crowns based on loaded (or trained) model

Returns:

predictions (array): Numpy array of predicted bounding boxes

train(self, image_dir, label_csv)[source]¶

Train a deep learning tree detection model This is the main entry point for training a new model based on either existing weights or scratch

Args:

image_dir (str): Directory of images label_csv (str): Path to csv label file, labels are in the format -> path/to/image.jpg,x1,y1,x2,y2,class_name

Returns:

model (object): A trained keras model

use_release(self)[source]¶

Use the latest DeepForest model release from github and load model. Optionally download if release doesn’t exist

Returns:

model (object): A trained keras model
